content: crochet these sweet and whimsical **primrose dolls** with gorgeous flowing hair flower crowns fabric dresses boots and bead necklaces these dolls are adorned with so many beautiful details read all about the making of these dolls **here** 1 and make one for yourself or as a special gift my separate *how to add hair to crochet dolls* tutorial can be found ***here*** 2 1 http //www allaboutami com/primrose-crochet-dolls/ 2 http //www allaboutami com/add-hair-crochet-dolls/
